successes.title: InkCase Plus: E Ink screen for Android phone
successes.description: InkCase Plus is an always on E Ink second screen; uses sports/fitness apps, an eBook reader, display Photo and receive notifications.

Pledges.description: A BIG THANK YOU from OAXIS for your support and receive first hand updates from us.
A BIG THANK YOU from OAXIS for your support. Receive project updates and an exclusive OAXIS InkCase Cap.

VERY EARLY BIRD: Be among the first to flaunt an InkCase+ in Black. This InkCase+ and FitCase will be sold for more than $139. Select between a pouch or Black FitCase for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

VERY EARLY BIRD: Be among the first to flaunt an InkCase+ in White.  This InkCase+ and FitCase will be sold for more than $139. Select between a pouch or White FitCase for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

EARLY BIRD: Be among the first to flaunt an InkCase+ in White. This InkCase+ and FitCase will be sold for more than $139. Select between a pouch or WHITE FitCase for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

EARLY BIRD: Be among the first to flaunt an InkCase+ in Black. This InkCase+ and FitCase will be sold for more than $139. Select between a pouch or Black FitCase for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

KICKSTARTER SPECIAL: Be among the first to flaunt an InkCase+ in Black. This InkCase+ and FitCase will be sold for more than $139. Select between a pouch or Black FitCase for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

KICKSTARTER SPECIAL: Be among the first to flaunt an InkCase+ in WHITE. This InkCase+ and FitCase will be sold for more than $139. Select between a pouch or Black FitCase for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

BUDDY: Get to flaunt TWO InkCase+ with your Buddy. One in  Black and another in White. Select between pouch or Black/White  FitCase for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

DEVELOPER SPECIAL: Be the first to develop APP on the InkCase+ and we will promote your APP together with our InkCase+ on Kickstarter (as long as campaign is active ). We will also publish your APP on www.inkcase.com.  You will get one of our first production units in Black with our SDK and support from our technical team. Your InkCase+ will come with a pouch AND Black FitCase for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! ).

FAMILY: Get to flaunt FIVE InkCase+ with your Family. Decide the number of  Black and White InkCase+ you want. Select between pouch or Black/White  FitCase for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

FRENZ: Get to flaunt TEN InkCase+ with your Friends. Decide the number of  Black and White InkCase+ you want. Select between pouch or Black/White  FitCase for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

LIMITED EDITION: Collect a PERSONALIZED InkCase+ with your NAME on it. Choose between Black and White color. It will come with a pouch and FitCase ( Choose between Black and White ) for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

LIMITED EDITION: Collect a PERSONALIZED InkCase+ with your NAME on it. Choose between Black and White color. It will come with a pouch and FitCase ( Choose between Black and White ) for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

LIMITED EDITION: Collect FIVE PERSONALIZED InkCase+ with your NAME on it. Choose between Black and White color. It will come with pouch and FitCase ( Choose between Black and White ) for S5 (If you wish to have FitCase for other phone model, we will do so provided there are at least 500polls. So get your friends to poll together! )

PARTNER: Start a business dialogue with us. You will be invited to dinner with the founders in LA. You will also get a personalized inkCase+ with pouch and FitCase (S5 or what is made based on polls by backers)

PARTNER: Start a business dialogue with us. You will be invited to dinner with OAXIS CEO in LA. You will also get a personalized inkCase+ with pouch and FitCase (S5 or what is made based on polls by backers)
